column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////After a lengthy plane ride and finally making it into downtown Chicago after what seemed to be the longest stop-and-go city traffic
column2: my sisters and I finally made our way to authentic a Chicago deep dish pizzeria. Be prepared to wait at least 1.5 hours especially during peak dinner time. We put our name down at the front desk
column3: then went to the right hand side to order our pizza
column4: so by the time we got a table it would only take 20-30 minutes more to wait for the pizza.
